message.body: Hey Victor, it's Eden. How's it going? So Michael's been annoyed with having to come up with a Christmas list. Haha. He never wants anything! So I'll try to help you out. I already got him two sweaters/ hoodies and a portable phone charger. I'm also going to get him an hdmi cable and probably another pair of vans sneakers. Oh, and my mom is getting him a new backpack since his is pretty old. He does need cologne. I don't know how much you want to spend. But he wears lacoste red. I've gotten it on Amazon. It runs around 40 bucks I think. Or, a hip city veg gift card? We always get shakes and he eats there often for lunch. And he's been wanting a plain black hoodie (size small). I've had no luck in finding one. So there are some ideas. Let me know if any sound good!
Hey!! How's it going? Thanks!! I really appreciate that! That's a big help. The cologne, the gift card, and the gift card sound like great ideas. I'll look into then and let you know what I went with
For the cologne, There's two different bottles here and one is like a cylinder, the other is more square. What does his bottle look like?
Ok thanks. Can I get him the cologne and the hoodie?
No problem. Thank you. I wanted to get him everything but I know he doesn't want me to spend too much.
Oh you don't mind me getting the cologne or hoodie do you? I just didn't know what he wanted and was hoping to start early this year
No. Not at all. It works out great this way.
Cool yea. And it's funny I was gonna ask you for advice or insight on what he'd want but I guess i didn't get a chance lol.
Yeah. I know you weren't the only one asking him what he wants so if Michelle our your mom need ideas, let me know.
Ok cool thanks. I'll pass it on.
I took off work today and I'm actually about to nap lol. I'll catchya later. Thanks again!
Haha. I took off today and yesterday. It's so bad. See you tomorrow.
